label: AdvancePayment
comment: A prepaid discharge of obligations in respect of funds or securities transferred between two or more parties.

objectProperties.comment: A tax included in this advance payment.
An invoice document referenced by this advance payment.
The monetary value of the funds or securities paid in this advance payment.
The formatted date or date time value when an advance payment has been received.

referencedBy.comment: An advance payment specified in this header trade settlement.
